name: Cartoon Stickman: Jump And Run On Road
name_original: Cartoon Stickman: Jump And Run On Road
description:
You will need to exercise your fingers. Most important, you need to be fast.

Tap on the screen to let the stickman jump. Collect as many stars as possible. Never touch black boxes. Most important, have fun! :-)

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay, easy and fun
•Collect golden stars and avoid black boxes
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
